About ISAAC Project Assembly Parent

The Maven Parent POM file for the ISAAC project assembly modules. Declares shared dependencies, sets up the build.

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
ISAAC Application Configuration Default properties used by ISAAC.
ISAAC Application Assembly Assembles specified ISAAC modules and configuration into an application.
